Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Bowl with an emphasised concave bottom, flared carinated body and inverted lip. The clay is common, orange and has been polished and covered, on both surfaces, with a brick-red slip. A spiral with three twirls was incised on the upper section of the body during the throwing process.
